meanings.definition: The process of making a substance soluble.
meanings.sent1: The solubilization of sugar in water is a common experiment in science class.
meanings.sent2: He observed the solubilization of the pill in the glass of water.
meanings.sent3: The solubilization of the chocolate in hot milk created a delicious drink.
meanings.sent4: The solubilization of the problem required careful consideration.
meanings.sent5: The solubilization of the dye in the fabric resulted in a vibrant color.

meanings.definition: The act of dissolving a substance in a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The solubilization of salt in water is a simple demonstration of chemistry.
meanings.sent2: She observed the solubilization of the ink in the solvent.
meanings.sent3: The solubilization of the sugar in the tea made it too sweet to drink.
meanings.sent4: The solubilization of the paint in the rain created a colorful mess.
meanings.sent5: The solubilization of the ice in the warm water happened quickly.
